sources.title: 1958 - Thunder Road - Camino de odio - Arthur Ripley - VOSE
sources.description: For Academic - Educational Use Only https://derechonoir.wordpress.com/

metadata.Plot: A veteran comes home from the Korean War to the mountains and takes over the family moonshining business. He has to battle big-city gangsters who are trying to take over the business and the police who are trying to put him in prison.
metadata.Writer: James Atlee Phillips, Walter Wise, Robert Mitchum
metadata.Actors: Robert Mitchum, Gene Barry, Jacques Aubuchon
